titles.title: Council on Rural Community Innovation and Economic Development Act of 2018
A bill to establish the Council on Rural Community Innovation and Economic Development.
Council on Rural Community Innovation and Economic Development Act of 2018

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry.

bill.summary:
Council on Rural Community Innovation and Economic Development Act of 2018
This bill establishes a Council on Rural Community Innovation and Economic Development and a Rural Broadband Integration Working Group.
